description:
go.talks/present/playground.js: make text function work with Firefox

Firefox does not support innerText, instead, it supports the textContent
property.

messages.text:
Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=55acff1bd261&repo=talks ***

go.talks/present/playground.js: make text function work with Firefox

Firefox does not support innerText, instead, it supports the textContent
property.

R=adg
CC=golang-dev
